amiller.colormap
Class ParametricFunction

java.lang.Object
  amiller.colormap.ParametricFunction

public final class ParametricFunction
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a ParametricColorMap function (in one color) with peak height, peak slope, horizontal position, and vertical offset.
